metadata.dc:title: poly-cloud-mcp
metadata.dc:creator: hyperpolymath
metadata.dc:subject: MCP, AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, DigitalOcean, Multi-Cloud
metadata.dc:description: Unified MCP server for multi-cloud provider management. Provides Model Context Protocol tools for interacting with AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, and DigitalOcean through their respective CLI tools.
